mapper.sql: comment_id AS "commentId", form_id AS "formId", form_type AS "formType", image_ids AS "imageIds", details AS "details", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_inquirty_comment where 1 = 1
and comment_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.commentId},'%')
and form_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.formId},'%')
and form_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.formType},'%')
and image_ids like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.imageIds},'%')
and details like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.details},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
